tasks.task_description: Create S3 bucket in member-profile account
Copy all content from default account bucket to member-profile bucket
Update local scripts to use new S3 bucket URL
Update CloudFormation template to use new S3 bucket
Switch to member-profile and test stack creation

description: Create S3 bucket in member-profile, copy content, update scripts, and test deployment
context: S3 bucket already exists in member-profile account. Content sync completed successfully.
S3 bucket and script are publicly accessible. No URL updates needed in templates.
